text:
HubSpot supports serverless function for cms enterprise accounts  that can be used to some extent for server side code that is hidden from the client.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/serverless-functions|You can check them out at this link>
Hey, <@U01D95STUS3>: do you know if it's possible to use the serverless function without CMS Hub Enterprise?
Yes it is possible to use it on developer sandbox account if you need to test it first, for production, only on the CMS enterprise
Is thee a limit on how many reusable sections can be provided to the editor?
